DOC.brief_title: Lymph Node Mapping Sentinel Lymph Node Identification Patients With Stage IB1 Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine sensitivity sentinel lymph node determination lymph node metastasis , use preoperative intraoperative lymphatic mapping , patient stage IB1 cervical cancer . II . Determine false-negative predictive value sentinel lymph node determination lymph node metastases patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive radiolabeled technetium Tc 99m sulfur colloid inject around tumor 6 hour prior induction anesthesia right surgery . Patients undergo radical hysterectomy complete pelvic low para-aortic lymphadenectomy . Intraoperatively , patient undergo lymphatic mapping sentinel lymph node identification use isosulfan blue methylene blue inject 4 location cervix hand-held gamma counter .
